amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike Title IV, subtitle E, which strikes a provision intended to allow for additional IRS regulation of 501(c)4s.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 33 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to protect the ability of 501(c)4s to advocate for causes by striking a provision intended to allow for additional IRS regulation of 501(c)4s.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson (OH) amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 237 (Roll no. 114).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson (OH) amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 237 (Roll no. 114).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Davidson (OH).
